title: Character Appearance Description
description: Schema for describing a character's appearance, optimized for image generation.

age_range.description: General age category. Influences facial features and body type.

gender_expression.description: How the character presents their gender (e.g., masculine, feminine, androgynous).  Not necessarily tied to assigned gender.

body_type.description: General body build. 'Other' allows for more specific descriptions.

height.description: Height in centimeters or inches (e.g., '175 cm' or '69 in').  Allows for numerical parsing.

color.description: Hair color (e.g., black, brown, blonde, red, gray).  Allow for more specific shades.

style.description: Hair style (e.g., short, long, curly, straight, braided, ponytail, shaved).

color.description: Eye color (e.g., blue, brown, green, hazel).

skin_tone.description: Skin tone description.  Be mindful of inclusive language and avoid harmful stereotypes.

facial_features.description: List of notable facial features (e.g., freckles, scars, prominent nose, strong jawline, dimples).

clothing_style.description: General clothing style (e.g., casual, formal, gothic, steampunk)

accessories.description: List of accessories (e.g., glasses, earrings, necklace, hat, tattoos).

image_style.description: The style of the profile image to generate. Use 'photo' for realistic/photorealistic images, 'drawing' for anime/cartoon/illustrated styles, 'stylized' for artistic/3D rendered/stylized images.
